title: Energy Vault Secures Swiss Market Entry with Signed B-VAULT™ Deployment Contracts for Schindler and Energie Wettingen Projects, Launch of FlexGrid Product for Urban and Utility Applications
description: Energy Vault signs two B-VAULT™ contracts in the Swiss market for projects with Schindler Aufzüge AG and Energie Wettingen, marking the launch of Energy Vault’s B-Vault™ FlexGrid program designed for commercial and industrial (C&I) customers Switzerland is a …
content: Energy Vaults entry into Switzerland is supported by the establishment of a regional service and logistics center in Central Switzerland, supporting deployments and after-sales service across the EME… [+8089 chars]
